core.title: Vaxx.nz
core.subtitle: See ways to get vaccinated near you.
core.disclaimerNotAGovWebsite: This is not an official Government website. To get vaccinated visit <0>bookmyvaccine.nz</0>
core.noResultsNotInNZ: No vaccination sites found for this search query. Are you in New Zealand?
core.noResultsInRadius: No vaccination sites found for this search query. Try a different search radius.
core.vaccApptToBook: Vaccination appointments available to book right now.

locationModal.locationCTA: Type in an address or suburb
locationModal.geolocationNotSupported: Geolocation is not supported by your browser

walkins.sectionHeader: Walk-in and Drive Thru Vaccination Centres
walkins.subHeader: You don't need an appointment to get vaccinated at these venues. Visit <0>covid19.govt.nz</0> for more information.
walkins.noWalkinDriveThruFound: There aren't any walk-in or drive thru vaccination centres in your area. Try make a booking instead.

cancellationNotice.message: Remember to cancel your original booking if you have one at <0>bookmyvaccine.nz</0>

noticeList.title: How to get Vaccinated
noticeList.text: Vaccinations might have a queue, and some places might not have spare vaccines available today - ring ahead if you can!

healthpointModal.title: How to get vaccinated here
healthpointModal.subtitle: Visit the address below and ask for a free COVID vaccination.
healthpointModal.queueQuery: You can also call <0>{{telephone}}</0> to check how long the queues are.

disclaimer.title: This location has been submitted by the public
disclaimer.message: The information here may not be 100% accurate. Please refer to the location's website.

howToBook.title: How to Book
howToBook.stepOne: Find a location and time from the list below.
howToBook.stepTwo: Click on the Make a Booking button, this will take you to <0>bookmyvaccine.nz
howToBook.stepFour: When asked, search for your desired location and time.

modal.noBookingsAvailable: No bookings are available on this day :(
modal.notBMV: This location does not use <0>bookmyvaccine.nz</0> and may have availability.

footer.message: If this site helped you, please consider sharing
footer.addressFinderLinkCopy: Thanks to <0>AddressFinder</0> for free-of-charge address lookup
